Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Interface CommandHandler

All Known Implementing Classes:
CommandHandlerImpl
public interface CommandHandler
CommandHandler is an interface thought to handle all commands received by Server. Its core is polymorphism: a general command arrives to Server, but the different ways to handle it depend on the dynamic type of the command itself (Visitor pattern is applied). This interface represent in practice the "abstract Visitor", while CommandHandlerImpl is the "concrete Visitor".

      This method handles an InitialInfoCommand.
      Parameters:

    • handle

      void handle​(PlayerCommand command)
      This method handles a PlayerCommand.
      Parameters:
      command - command containing player's move, build, ... in RealGame phase (the proper match)

    • handle

      void handle​(GodChoiceCommand command)
      This method handles a GodChoiceCommand.
      Parameters:
      command - command containing player's chosen god (or gods if god-chooser player)

      This method handles a GamePreparationCommand.
      Parameters:
      gamePreparationCommand - command containing initial positions of workers on the board
